topic.title: OSSA 0.1.9 – Interoperability, Governance, and Evaluation
topic.shortdesc: Deliver cross-framework adapters, enforce token budgets, formalize review metrics and auditability, and introduce props tokens.

section.title: Objectives
section.p: Make OSSA portable across LangGraph, AutoGen, Semantic Kernel, and observable in MLflow. Enforce budgets proactively and introduce auditor-friendly trails.

section.title: Key Artifacts
section.p: Adapters for major frameworks; Budget Governor service; Review Metrics vocabulary and MLflow dashboards; Audit API and UI; Props token grammar and resolver.

section.title: Implementation Notes
section.p: Ensure adapters are thin and stateless; map ExecutionReport/FeedbackPacket directly. Hash-chain audit entries. Target ≥ 50% prompt-size reduction using props tokens.

section.title: Security
section.p: Publish MCP hardening guide: AuthN/Z examples, resource allowlists, and prompt-injection mitigations. Provide presets and tests.

section.title: Acceptance
section.p: End-to-end demos for each adapter; budget overflow prevented with explainable routing; MLflow visualizes judge evidence; audit viewer filters by time and actor.
